name: RollChemist
description:
This is RollChemist!

Create potions from random dice rolls. Use the skill cards to manipulate the dice values and press the craft button to make different kinds of potions. However, you need to manage your mana, and using skill cards takes some of them away.

Instructions:

-  You will be given a random dice roll at the start.

- You can check the dice combination or 'recipe' for the potions.

- Use the skill cards on the bottom to manipulate the dice values. Some cards activate automatically and some you have to pick which die to manipulate. Use them carefully cause skill cards use mana.

- Click on the Craft Button on the right to craft potion.

- Earn gold and reach the goal to progress.

- Higher levels will drain mana faster.
